columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pipe.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The time the pipe was created.

columns.name: current_state
columns.description: The state the pipe is in.

columns.name: desired_state
columns.description: The state the pipe should be in.

columns.name: enrichment
columns.description: The ARN of the enrichment resource.

columns.name: last_modified_time
columns.description: When the pipe was last updated.

columns.name: role_arn
columns.description: The ARN of the role that allows the pipe to send data to the target.

columns.name: source
columns.description: The ARN of the source resource.

columns.name: source_prefix
columns.description: The prefix matching the pipe source.

columns.name: state_reason
columns.description: The reason the pipe is in its current state.

columns.name: target
columns.description: The ARN of the target resource.

columns.name: target_prefix
columns.description: The prefix matching the pipe target.

columns.name: enrichment_parameters
columns.description: The parameters required to set up enrichment on your pipe.

columns.name: target_parameters
columns.description: The parameters required to set up a target for your pipe.
